Literature.Title: The antimicrobial peptide LI14 combats multidrug-resistant bacterial infections.
Literature.Author: Shi J, Chen C, Wang D, Wang Z, Liu Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus T144(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 215(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis A4(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis 1F-1(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium 5F-10(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli B2(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=64µg/ml),Psychrobacter cibarius(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=16µg/ml)
